House_Baratheon.name: House Baratheon
coat of arms: A black crowned stag, on a gold field
Or, a stag salient, crowned, sable
title: Lord of Storm's End
Lord Paramount of the Stormlands

House_Caron.name: House Caron
coat of arms: A field of black nightingales on yellow
Or, sem  of nightingales sable
title: Lord of Nightsong
Lord of the Marches
Marshal of the Marches

House_Dondarrion.name: House Dondarrion
coat of arms: A forked purple lightning bolt, on black field speckled with four-pointed stars
Sable, sem  of mullets of four points argent, a lightning bolt forked purpure
House_Dondarrion.title: Lord of Blackhaven

House_Selmy.name: House Selmy
coat of arms: Three stalks of yellow wheat, on a brown field
(Brunâtre, three stalks of wheat or)
title: Lord of Harvest Hall
Knight of Harvest Hall
(formerly)

House_Swann.name: House Swann
coat of arms: Battling swans black and white, beaks and feet golden, on per pale white and black field
Per pale argent and sable, two swans combatant counterchanged, beaked and membered or
House_Swann.title: Lord of Stonehelm

House_Buckler.name: House Buckler
coat of arms: Three brass buckles, on a blue field
Azure, three buckles or
House_Buckler.title: Lord of Bronzegate

House_Cafferen.name: House Cafferen
coat of arms: Two white fawns counter salient, on a green field
Vert, two fawns counter-salient argent
House_Cafferen.title: Lord of Fawnton

House_Errol.name: House Errol
coat of arms: A yellow haystack, on an orange field
Tenn , a haystack or
House_Errol.title: Lord of Haystack Hall

House_Estermont.name: House Estermont
coat of arms: A dark-green sea-turtle on a pale-green field
Vert, a sea-turtle tergiant of the field
House_Estermont.title: Lord of Greenstone

House_Fell.name: House Fell
coat of arms: Per fess, a white crescent moon on a black field above a green field, a sprucetree line between
(Per fess sapin  sable and vert, in canton a moon increscent argent)
House_Fell.title: Lord of Felwood

House_Gower.name: House Gower
coat of arms: Nine yellow trefoils on a black cross, on an ermine field
Ermine, on a cross sable nine trefoils or

House_Grandison.name: House Grandison
coat of arms: A black sleeping lion, on a yellow field
Or, a lion dormant sable
House_Grandison.title: Lord of Grandview

House_Hasty.name: House Hasty
coat of arms: A white bend cotised, on a purple field
Purpure, a bend cotised argent

House_Herston.name: House Herston
coat of arms: A yellow rooster's head with red comb, within a white escutcheon, on a red field
Gules, on an escutcheon argent, a cock's head or, combed and wattled of the field

House_Horpe.name: House Horpe
coat of arms: Per chevron engrailed grey and bone, three death's head moths counterchanged
(Per chevron engrailed cendr e and argent, three death's head moths counterchanged)

House_Kellington.name: House Kellington
coat of arms: A black book bound in bronze, locked, on a pale blue field
(Bleu celeste, a book sable clasped and garnished bronze)

House_Lonmouth.name: House Lonmouth
coat of arms: Quartered of six: red lips strewn on a yellow field, yellow skulls strewn on a black field
Quarterly of six, first, third and fifth, or, sem  of lips gules, second, fourth and sixth, sable, sem  of skulls of the first

House_Mertyns.name: House Mertyns
coat of arms: A white great horned owl on a grey field
Cendr e, a great-horned owl close affront  argent

House_Morrigen.name: House Morrigen
coat of arms: A black crow in flight on a storm-green field
Vert, a crow volant sable
House_Morrigen.title: Lord of Crow's Nest

House_Musgood.name: House Musgood
coat of arms: Quarterly: A golden pavilion on a blue field, a green laurel crown on a white field
Quarterly, first and fourth, azure, a pavilion or, second and third, argent, a garland of laurel vert

House_Peasebury.name: House Peasebury
coat of arms: A green pea pod, burst open, on a white field, bordered by three rows of green peas
Argent, a pea pod open within a bordure of three rows of peas vert
House_Peasebury.title: Lord of Poddingfield

House_Penrose.name: House Penrose
coat of arms: White crossed quills, on a russet field
(Brunâtre, two quills saltirewise argent)
House_Penrose.title: Lord of Parchments

House_Rogers.name: House Rogers
coat of arms: Nine silver unicorns around a silver maze, on a black field
(Sable, a maze within an annulet of nine unicorns argent)

House_Staedmon.name: House Staedmon
coat of arms: A black dagger piercing a red heart on a white de sang field, within an undulating red border
Argent goutt -de-sang, a heart gules transfixed by a dagger sable, all within a bordure wavy of the second

House_Swygert.name: House Swygert
coat of arms: A white scroll with gold knobs, on a purple field within a white tressure
Purpure a scroll argent, knobbed or, within a tressure of the second

House_Tarth.name: House Tarth
coat of arms: Quartered, yellow sun on a rose-coloured field and white crescents on a blue field
(Quarterly, first and fourth rose, a sun-in-splendour or, second and third azure, a moon increscent argent)
title: King of Tarth
(formerly)
Lord of Evenfall
The
Evenstar

House_Trant.name: House Trant
coat of arms: A black hanged man, on a blue field
Azure, a hanged man sable
House_Trant.title: Lord of Gallowsgrey

House_Tudbury.name: House Tudbury
coat of arms: A brown tortoise within a yellow lozenge, on a green field
(Vert, on a lozenge or a tortoise tergiant brunâtre)

House_Wagstaff.name: House Wagstaff
coat of arms: Five yellow mascles, on a green field
Vert, five mascles in fess or

House_Wensington.name: House Wensington
coat of arms: Two golden trumpets crossed on a blue field, beneath a gold chief with three black stags
Azure, two trumpets saltirewise or, on a chief of the second three stags salient sable

House_Wylde.name: House Wylde
coat of arms: A blue-green maelstrom, on a gold field
(Or, a gurges aquamarine)
House_Wylde.title: Lord of the Rain House

House_Bolling.name: House Bolling
coat of arms: Vairy orange and blue, upon a black canton, a golden stag beneath an orange bend sinister
Vairy tenn  and azure, on a canton sable a stag or debruised by a bend sinister of the first

House_Connington.name: House Connington
coat of arms: Two combatant griffins, counterchanged, on a red and white field
Per pale gules and argent, two griffins combatant counterchanged
title: Lord of Griffin's Roost
Knight of Griffin's Roost
(post
-Robert's Rebellion

House_Seaworth.name: House Seaworth
coat of arms: A black ship on a pale grey field, with a white onion on its sails
Cendr e, a ship sable, its sail charged with an onion argent
House_Seaworth.title: Lord of the Rainwood

House_Cole.name: House Cole
coat of arms: Ten black pellets, on a scarlet field
Gules, ten pellets, 4, 3, 2, 1

House_Durrandon.name: House Durrandon
coat of arms: A black crowned stag, on a gold field
Or, a stag salient, crowned, sable
House_Durrandon.title: Storm King

House_Toyne.name: House Toyne
coat of arms: A black winged heart, on a gold field, within a black embattled border
(Or, a heart with wings within a bordure embattled sable)
